channel.title: goroutines on Golang island
channel.description: Recent content in goroutines on Golang island

item.title: A few must-have Golang tricks
item.description: Go is a very good programming language. It is a language that allows you to really focus on your business and not have to worry too much about the program itself, so you can write applications as quickly as possible. For example, it has a relatively complete ecosystem that can provide you with everything you need to get started. But then, it’s not a panacea, and there are some things we need to be aware of.
